column4: he wants to know if he should dl 32bit or 64 bit, he said something about removing 3GB of ram to get it to work and running Ubuntu 5.1
the video card is 1 line...not over 3
oops sorry i'm reading several lines behind here
no prob, my client is lagging
it sounds like the reset he did on the board did not work right. imho, thats why i was thinking of flashing it
he can't make up his mind one minute the ram doens't work at all the next windows ran fine with the ram in...either it turns on or it doesn't....
i still wonder if the old ubuntu he has is too old to handle the ram? i thought the older kernels had a 4GB limit, then again, i am not faimilar with 5.1
what i'm wondering is why he's on a version from like 7 years ago
i think the best bet is he just needs to put 11.04 on it and then we see what to do.
and wallrace i know nothing about 2wires.
wallrace 2wires FAIL...with that said...it should have port forwarding/dmz abilities check portforward.com and then just replace the game port with 22
wallrace did you try that site and seeing if it had the 2wire model listed or try a similar model name and just clickon a random app replace the port with 22
go ahead, if this client will support it :P
